code: import React from"react";import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Footer=()=>{const location=useLocation();const homePaths=['/','/anfit-info'];const classPaths=['/class-pass'];const reservPaths=['/reservation'];const commuPaths=['/community'];const mypagePaths=['/mypage'];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("footer",{className:"footer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"footer-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"btn-box0",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:homePaths.includes(location.pathname)?'active btn':'btn',children:"\uD648"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"btn-box1",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/class-pass",className:classPaths.includes(location.pathname)?'active btn':'btn',children:"\uC218\uAC15\uAD8C"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"btn-box2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/reservation",className:reservPaths.includes(location.pathname)?'active btn':'btn',children:"\uC218\uC5C5\uC608\uC57D"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"btn-box3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/community",className:commuPaths.includes(location.pathname)?'active btn':'btn',children:"\uCEE4\uBBA4\uB2C8\uD2F0"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"btn-box4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/mypage",className:mypagePaths.includes(location.pathname)?'active btn':'btn',children:"\uB9C8\uC774\uD398\uC774\uC9C0"})})]})});};export default Footer;
